data.message: Facebook will you please message me back?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Mike. Let us know how we can help and we'll do our best to answer any questions. -Jessica

Yes I messaged you about getting helping fixing my page and changing my password as I cannot change it because I forgot my original. And I am not getting the code in my email and I do not have the other email addresses

Hi Mike. If you can't find your confirmation email, try these tips: http://bit.ly/2pRT4Xv. Additionally, if you can't log into Facebook and need to reset your password, follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2pRKh83. -Jessica
Jessica will you please message me so I can reset my password I have tried it all I even sent a picture of my id in to retrieve my account to make a new password
What happened to the share button?  It's missing on so many posts, mine and my friends.

您好  我們是台灣的學習媒體平台  

我們已經多次向您申請  Facebook Audience Network 但是都不通過 

希望您可以給我們一次機會  

這是我們的信箱: crazyuser.tw@gmail.com 

希望您可以給我們來信  誠心請求

I am having problems getting my messages from my page. My inbox says I have 5 but every time I go to retrieve them they pop up for a second then disappear... This just started happenning today.. help, I need to communicate with people who message my page. I have sent several reports already...
Wh don t you do it
I don't noing you .and don't trust forget!!!!hakker
Facebook : Facebook, can you answer me, please? I sent you a private message. Thank you.
